page.title: 15LIFE STYLES:THE ELDERLY
page.content: {GRANDPARENT LIVING ALONE.}She wakes up at 8.30am and has a breakfast of cereal,crispbread and tea.After dressing she washes the dishes and does light housework.Every Tuesday she collects her{old age pension}of Â£35.80 at the Busby Post Office.Most days she shops locally for food.She visits her grandchildren at weekends. In the evenings she watches television. {CARE OF THE ELDERLY.}In the area there are two examples of such care.There is an{old peoples'home}called Bonnyton House run by the Social Work department.The home is for the elderly who are unable to live at home alone. There are some{sheltered houses already in use and more are being built.These are specially built houses for the elderly who can look after themselves.There is a warden and a warning system if help is required.
